title: Cadence beats quarterly profit and revenue estimates on strong AI-linked demand
description: Cadence Design Systems beat quarterly revenue estimates on Tuesday, as strong demand for complex artificial intelligence processors lifted sales of its chip design software.
content:
Shares of the San Jose, California-based company were up nearly 4% in extended trading.

title: Blackstone founder Stephen Schwarzman plans to donate his entire $48 billion fortune to a major philanthropic foundation
description: US News: Stephen Schwarzman, founder of Blackstone, plans to donate his entire $48 billion fortune to the Stephen A. Schwarzman Foundation, focusing on philanthropic efforts in artificial intelligence and education. This move could place the foundation among the largest charitable organizations worldwide.

title: Adani Pledges $100 billion for Data Infrastructure
description: The Adani Group announced a $100 billion plan to build Indias sovereign artificial intelligence (AI) and data infrastructure over the next decade, one of the largest commitments toward the countrys data centre ecosystem.

title: Nvidia to sell Meta millions of chips in multiyear deal
description: Nvidia on Tuesday said it has signed a multiyear deal to sell Meta Platforms millions of its current and future artificial intelligence chips, including central processing units that compete with products from Intel and Advanced Micro Devices .

title: HIVE Revenue Jumps 219% as AI Expansion Offsets Bitcoin Price Weakness
description: HIVE reports $93.1 million in third-quarter revenue, up 219% year over year, as growth in artificial intelligence infrastructure helps offset pressure from Bitcoin mining.
content:
HIVE Digital Technologies delivered a record fiscal third quarter despite weaker Bitcoin prices, suggesting that its expansion into artificial intelligence and high-performance computing is offsetting broader crypto-market headwinds.

title: Scientists: AI Could Misuse Bio Data, Design Harmful Viruses
description: More than 100 researchers from leading universities are warning that some publicly available biological data could be used to design dangerous viruses as artificial intelligence systems grow more capable of analyzing genetic code.
content:
As artificial intelligence systems grow more capable of analyzing genetic code, more than 100 researchers from leading universities are warning that some publicly available biological data could be used to design dangerous viruses.
